instruction: Please analyze the records of quality firms in the U.S., non-U.S., and emerging markets, and split them into value and growth segments, as well as high- and low-quality halves.
output: Sure, I will begin by compiling data on quality firms in the three major equity markets and segmenting them into value and growth categories. Then, I will further divide these segments into high- and low-quality halves for a more in-depth analysis of each market and segment. I will present my findings once the analysis is complete.
